verses.text: \w After|strong="H0310"\w* these \w things|strong="H1697"\w* did \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w* \w promote|strong="H1431"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hammedatha|strong="H4099"\w* the \w Agagite|strong="H0091"\w*, and \w advanced|strong="H5375"\w* him, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* his \w seat|strong="H3678"\w* above all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* that \add were\add* with him.

And all the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, that \add were\add* in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w*, and \w reverenced|strong="H7812"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*: for the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had so \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* concerning him. But \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w* not, nor did \add him\add* \w reverence|strong="H7812"\w*.

Then the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, which \add were\add* in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, Why \w transgressest|strong="H5674"\w* thou the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*?

Now it came to pass, when they \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* unto him, and he \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto them, that they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* whether \w Mordecai’s|strong="H4782"\w* \w matters|strong="H1697"\w* would \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*: for he had \w told|strong="H5046"\w* them that he \add was\add* a \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w*.

And when \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w* not, nor did him \w reverence|strong="H7812"\w*, then was \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*.

And he \w thought|strong="H5869"\w* \w scorn|strong="H0959"\w* to \w lay|strong="H7971"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* on \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* alone; for they had \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* him the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*: wherefore \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* all the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* that \add were\add* throughout the whole \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, \add even\add* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*.

¶ In the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, that \add is\add*, the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Nisan|strong="H5212"\w*, in the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, they \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w Pur|strong="H6332"\w*, that \add is\add*, the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* from \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and from \w month|strong="H2320"\w* to \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add to\add* the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \add month\add*, that \add is\add*, the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w*.

¶ And \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, There \w is|strong="H3426"\w* a \w certain|strong="H0259"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* scattered \w abroad|strong="H6340"\w* and \w dispersed|strong="H6504"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in all the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* of thy \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*; and their \w laws|strong="H1881"\w* \add are\add* \w diverse|strong="H8138"\w* from all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; neither \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* they the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w laws|strong="H1881"\w*: therefore it \add is\add* not for the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w profit|strong="H7737"\w* to \w suffer|strong="H3240"\w* them.\f + \fr 3.8 \ft for the…: Heb. meet or, equal, etc\f*

If it \w please|strong="H2895"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, let it be \w written|strong="H3789"\w* that they may be \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w*: and I will \w pay|strong="H8254"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* to the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of those that have the \w charge|strong="H6213"\w* of the \w business|strong="H4399"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \add it\add* into the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w treasuries|strong="H1595"\w*.\f + \fr 3.9 \ft that they…: Heb. to destroy them\f*\f + \fr 3.9 \ft pay: Heb. weigh\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w took|strong="H5493"\w* his \w ring|strong="H2885"\w* from his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* it unto \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hammedatha|strong="H4099"\w* the \w Agagite|strong="H0091"\w*, the \w Jews’|strong="H3064"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w*.\f + \fr 3.10 \ft enemy: or, oppressor\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, The \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \add is\add* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to thee, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* also, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with them as it \w seemeth|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* to thee.

Then were the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w scribes|strong="H5608"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* on the \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, and there was \w written|strong="H3789"\w* according to all that \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* unto the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w lieutenants|strong="H0323"\w*, and to the \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* that \add were\add* over every \w province|strong="H4082"\w*, and to the \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of every \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of every \w province|strong="H4082"\w* according to the \w writing|strong="H3791"\w* thereof, and \add to\add* every \w people|strong="H5971"\w* after their \w language|strong="H3956"\w*; in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w* was it \w written|strong="H3789"\w*, and \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* with the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*.\f + \fr 3.12 \ft scribes: or, secretaries\f*

And the \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* were \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w posts|strong="H7323"\w* into all the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w*, to \w kill|strong="H2026"\w*, and to cause to \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, all \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, both \w young|strong="H5288"\w* and \w old|strong="H2205"\w*, little \w children|strong="H2945"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add even\add* upon the \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \add day\add* of the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, which is the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w*, and \add to take\add* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of them for a \w prey|strong="H0962"\w*.

The \w copy|strong="H6572"\w* of the \w writing|strong="H3791"\w* for a \w commandment|strong="H1881"\w* to be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* in every \w province|strong="H4082"\w* was \w published|strong="H1540"\w* unto all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that they should be \w ready|strong="H6264"\w* against that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

The \w posts|strong="H7323"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, being \w hastened|strong="H1765"\w* by the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w*, and the \w decree|strong="H1881"\w* was \w given|strong="H5414"\w* in \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* the \w palace|strong="H1002"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*; but the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* was \w perplexed|strong="H0943"\w*.
